A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The pacing was off\, there was no internal logic regarding physics they have established themselves\, inappropriate Slapstick\, cheap use of clichees\, characters not making any sense and all around not a good time\, i have i would not have seen it\, becauser as a star wars fan myself i feel ridiculed and embarassed\, i dearly hope this movie gets a redcon. I am going to be honest\, every critic recommending this movie in my mind has to be bought since even though the movie has a great Looks incredible Music\, and more or less good effects\, the plot itself is severly lacking\, that being an Understatement.\nI hope this Review was somewhat helpful to anyone reading it\, i do not think im going to go and see the next one in cinemas\, if i see it at all. Have a nice day
